caption.p: Three main bio-macromolecules contents of 18 Aurantiochytrium sp. strains deduced from the FT-IR analysis ( A) and the traditional biochemical methods ( B), and bio-macromolecules contents of cell between the H 2O-treated group (H group) and the D 2O-treated group (D group) for Aurantiochytrium sp. strain No. 6 ( C). Data are given as means Â± standard deviation, n = 3.
